subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Yankees prospect Jesus Montero’s tryout for the Mets in 2006, when he was a 16-year-old catcher, ended when he was hit in his glove hand by a bat.
snippet: Yankees prospect Jesus Montero’s tryout for the Mets in 2006, when he was a 16-year-old catcher, ended when he was hit in his glove hand by a bat.
